name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior SRE Engineer with over 10 years of experience in cloud-native architectures and incident management. Skilled in implementing robust **DevOps** practices and automating workflows using **CI/CD** tools such as **GitHub**, **Azure DevOps**, **GitLab**, and **Jenkins**. Proficient in monitoring and troubleshooting systems with tools like **Datadog**, **New Relic**, **Dynatrace**, **Prometheus**, and **Grafana**. Expertise in **cloud** services including **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP**, as well as container orchestration using **Docker** and **Kubernetes**. Demonstrated ability to develop high-performing APIs and automation tools utilizing **Python** (including **FastAPI**, **Django**, **Flask**) and frameworks such as **Java** and **Springboot**. Proven track record collaborating with top-tier organizations like VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska to deliver impactful backend solutions in financial platforms and AI/ML pipelines.
